name: ⚄ ChanceScape ⚄
description:
A dangerous game of skill, strategy, and of course chance, in ChanceScape you play as a young square trying to get some Luck for its family. You have seven days to carefully navigate ChanceScape, getting as much Luck as possible during that time. However, one wrong roll and you may find yourself face to face with a Guardian, a ruthless being designed to defend ChanceScape. Score as high as possible by the end of all seven days.

Made by Cyunder for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
